main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 23 October 1956, involving a red glow that became stationary and appeared to move up and down.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes,The object was reported to have a dull red color,It was suspected to possibly be a balloon or an astronomical satellite,Two objects were seen during the observation,The witness noted a dark, roaring sound associated with the object.
sighted object: a red glowing object in the sky
witness description: Witness details are redacted, described seeing the object with a little girl present.
